verses.verse: זְב֣וּבֵי <WH2070> flies מָ֔וֶת <WH4194> Dead יַבְאִ֥ישׁ <WH887> a stinking savour יַבִּ֖יעַ <WH5042> to send forth שֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> cause the ointment רוֹקֵ֑חַ <WH7543> of the apothecary יָקָ֛ר <WH3368> him that is in reputation מֵחָכְמָ֥ה <WH2451> for wisdom מִכָּב֖וֹד <WH3519> [and] honour סִכְל֥וּת <WH5531> folly מְעָֽט׃ <WH4592> [so doth] a little
לֵ֤ב <WH3820> heart חָכָם֙ <WH2450> A wise man's לִֽימִינ֔וֹ <WH3225> [is] at his right hand וְלֵ֥ב <WH3820> heart כְּסִ֖יל <WH3684> but a fool's לִשְׂמֹאלֽוֹ׃ <WH8040> at his left

וְגַם־ <WH1571> Even בַּדֶּ֛רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way [כְּשֶׁהַסָּכָל כ] (כְּשֶׁסָּכָ֥ל <WH5530> the fool ק) הֹלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> walketh לִבּ֣וֹ <WH3820> his wisdom חָסֵ֑ר <WH2638> faileth וְאָמַ֥ר <WH559> [him] and he saith לַכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> to everyone סָכָ֥ל <WH5530> Yea also when he that is a fool הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

אִם־ <WH518> If ר֤וּחַ <WH7307> If the spirit הַמּוֹשֵׁל֙ <WH4910> of the ruler תַּעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> rise up עָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> against מְקוֹמְךָ֖ <WH4725> not thy place אַל־ <WH408> nay תַּנַּ֑ח <WH3240> against thee leave כִּ֣י <WH3588> because מַרְפֵּ֔א <WH4832> for yielding יַנִּ֖יחַ <WH3240> pacifieth חֲטָאִ֥ים <WH2399> offences גְּדוֹלִֽים׃ <WH1419> great

יֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> There is רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> an evil רָאִ֖יתִי <WH7200> [which] I have seen תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> under the sun כִּשְׁגָגָ֕ה <WH7684> as an error שֶׁיֹּצָ֖א <WH3318> [which] proceedeth מִלִּפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> from הַשַּׁלִּֽיט׃ <WH7989> the ruler

נִתַּ֣ן <WH5414> is set הַסֶּ֔כֶל <WH5529> Folly בַּמְּרוֹמִ֖ים <WH4791> dignity רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> in great וַעֲשִׁירִ֖ים <WH6223> and the rich בַּשֵּׁ֥פֶל <WH8216> in low place יֵשֵֽׁבוּ׃ <WH3427> sit

רָאִ֥יתִי <WH7200> I have seen עֲבָדִ֖ים <WH5650> servants עַל־ <WH5921> on סוּסִ֑ים <WH5483> upon horses וְשָׂרִ֛ים <WH8269> and princes הֹלְכִ֥ים <WH1980> walking כַּעֲבָדִ֖ים <WH5650> as servants עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> upon the earth

חֹפֵ֥ר <WH2658> He that diggeth גּוּמָּ֖ץ <WH1475> a pit בּ֣וֹ יִפּ֑וֹל <WH5307> shall fall וּפֹרֵ֥ץ <WH6555> into it and whoso breaketh גָּדֵ֖ר <WH1447> an hedge יִשְּׁכֶ֥נּוּ <WH5391> shall bite נָחָֽשׁ׃ <WH5175> a serpent

מַסִּ֣יעַ <WH5265> Whoso removeth אֲבָנִ֔ים <WH68> stones יֵעָצֵ֖ב <WH6087> shall be hurt בָּהֶ֑ם בּוֹקֵ֥עַ <WH1234> therewith [and] he that cleaveth עֵצִ֖ים <WH6086> wood יִסָּ֥כֶן <WH5533> shall be endangered בָּֽם׃

אִם־ <WH518> If קֵהָ֣ה <WH6949> be blunt הַבַּרְזֶ֗ל <WH1270> If the iron וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> he לֹא־ <WH3808> not פָנִ֣ים <WH6440> the edge קִלְקַ֔ל <WH7043> and he do not whet וַחֲיָלִ֖ים <WH2428> to more strength יְגַבֵּ֑ר <WH1396> then must he put וְיִתְר֥וֹן <WH3504> [is] profitable הַכְשֵׁ֖יר <WH3787> to direct חָכְמָֽה׃ <WH2451> but wisdom

אִם־ <WH518> If יִשֹּׁ֥ךְ <WH5391> will bite הַנָּחָ֖שׁ <WH5175> Surely the serpent בְּלוֹא־ <WH3808> being לָ֑חַשׁ <WH3908> without enchantment וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> there יִתְר֔וֹן <WH3504> is no better לְבַ֖עַל <WH1167> archer הַלָּשֽׁוֹן׃ <WH3956> babbler

דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> The words פִי־ <WH6310> mouth חָכָ֖ם <WH2450> of a wise man's חֵ֑ן <WH2580> [are] gracious וְשִׂפְת֥וֹת <WH8193> but the lips כְּסִ֖יל <WH3684> of a fool תְּבַלְּעֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH1104> will swallow up

תְּחִלַּ֥ת <WH8462> The beginning דִּבְרֵי־ <WH1697> of the words פִ֖יהוּ <WH6310> of his mouth סִכְל֑וּת <WH5531> [is] foolishness וְאַחֲרִ֣ית <WH319> and the end פִּ֔יהוּ <WH6310> of his talk הוֹלֵל֖וּת <WH1948> madness רָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> [is] mischievous

וְהַסָּכָ֖ל <WH5530> A fool יַרְבֶּ֣ה <WH7235> also is full דְבָרִ֑ים <WH1697> of words לֹא־ <WH3808> No יֵדַ֤ע <WH3045> cannot tell הָאָדָם֙ <WH120> a man מַה־ <WH4100> what שֶׁיִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> will happen וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> what יִֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> will come מֵֽאַחֲרָ֔יו <WH310> what shall be and what shall be after מִ֖י <WH4310> and who יַגִּ֥יד <WH5046> him who can tell לֽוֹ׃

עֲמַ֥ל <WH5999> The labour הַכְּסִילִ֖ים <WH3684> of the foolish תְּיַגְּעֶ֑נּוּ <WH3021> wearieth אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יָדַ֖ע <WH3045> every one of them because he knoweth לָלֶ֥כֶת <WH1980> to go אֶל־ <WH413> to עִֽיר׃ <WH5892> to the city

אִֽי־ <WH337> Woe לָ֣ךְ אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> to thee O land שֶׁמַּלְכֵּ֖ךְ <WH4428> when thy king נָ֑עַר <WH5288> [is] a child וְשָׂרַ֖יִךְ <WH8269> and thy princes בַּבֹּ֥קֶר <WH1242> in the morning יֹאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> eat

אַשְׁרֵ֣יךְ <WH835> Blessed אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> [art] thou O land שֶׁמַּלְכֵּ֖ךְ <WH4428> when thy king בֶּן־ <WH1121> [is] the son חוֹרִ֑ים <WH2715> of nobles וְשָׂרַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH8269> and thy princes בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> in due season יֹאכֵ֔לוּ <WH398> eat בִּגְבוּרָ֖ה <WH1369> for strength וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> for בַשְּׁתִֽי׃ <WH8358> and not for drunkenness

בַּעֲצַלְתַּ֖יִם <WH6103> By much slothfulness יִמַּ֣ךְ <WH4355> decayeth הַמְּקָרֶ֑ה <WH4746> the building וּבְשִׁפְל֥וּת <WH8220> and through idleness יָדַ֖יִם <WH3027> of the hands יִדְלֹ֥ף <WH1811> droppeth through הַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> the house

לִשְׂחוֹק֙ <WH7814> for laughter עֹשִׂ֣ים <WH6213> is made לֶ֔חֶם <WH3899> A feast וְיַ֖יִן <WH3196> and wine יְשַׂמַּ֣ח <WH8055> makes חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> age וְהַכֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> but money יַעֲנֶ֥ה <WH6030> answereth אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֹּֽל׃ <WH3605> to everything

גַּ֣ם <WH1571> Furthermore בְּמַדָּֽעֲךָ֗ <WH4093> no not in thy thought מֶ֚לֶךְ <WH4428> not the king אַל־ <WH408> not תְּקַלֵּ֔ל <WH7043> Curse וּבְחַדְרֵי֙ <WH2315> rooms מִשְׁכָּ֣בְךָ֔ <WH4904> your sleeping אַל־ <WH408> not תְּקַלֵּ֖ל <WH7043> and curse עָשִׁ֑יר <WH6223> not the rich כִּ֣י <WH3588> for ע֤וֹף <WH5775> for a bird הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> of the air יוֹלִ֣יךְ <WH1980> will carry אֶת־ <WH853> הַקּ֔וֹל <WH6963> the voice וּבַ֥עַל <WH1167> and that which hath [הַכְּנָפַיִם כ] (כְּנָפַ֖יִם <WH3671> bird ק) יַגֵּ֥יד <WH5046> shall tell דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> the matter
